string-array.item: Blood donors will receive a text message when their blood is being sent to hospital to be used by someone who needs it, officials have said.

Blood donors will be able to track the journey their blood takes through Google Maps in a bid to keep more people donating.\nRoadmaps will be emailed to donors when their blood is issued, showing which hospital receives their donation and where it is processed..
Hospitals in Manchester have enough blood supplies to treat patients including the victims of last nightâ€™s arena attack, the NHS has said.

On the occasion of World Blood Donor Day 2019, WHO Regional Director for the Eastern Mediterranean Dr Ahmed Al-Mandhari emphasized that everyone in the world had the right to access safe blood transfusion, when and where it was needed.
An Australian man who has given blood a record-breaking 1,173 times, helping to save more than two million babies, has made his final donation.
The FreedomToDonate campaign has helped to launch and announce a parliamentary inquiry, bringing together leading charities, organisations and health experts in blood donation policy area.
